meanings.definition: To have a mistaken understanding or knowledge of something.
meanings.sent1: She misknows the answer to the math problem.
meanings.sent2: He misknows the date of the event.
meanings.sent3: The detective misknows the identity of the culprit, leading to a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her fear misknows the true danger lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: Their superstitions misknow the reality of the situation.

meanings.definition: To be ignorant or unaware of something.
meanings.sent1: They misknow the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: She misknows the location of the new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The cat misknows the presence of a mouse in the house, much to the mouse's relief.
meanings.sent4: His excitement misknows the challenges that lie ahead.
meanings.sent5: Their laughter misknows the sadness hidden behind the smiles.
